bug.short_desc: error while loading shared libraries: libquazip.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Cannot start qcad.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): qcad-3.16.3.0-1.fc25.x86_64 and qcad-3.16.2.0-2.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. install 2. run 3. error
Actual results: $ qcad /usr/lib64/qcad/qcad-bin: error while loading shared libraries: libquazip.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

(In reply to Antonio Trande from comment #1) > Is quazip installed?
Nope, but installing it resolved the problem. Looks like a missing dep.
